com.plumcreektechnology.tala0_0
Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.plumcreektechnology.tala0_0.LocationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener, Tala_Constants
public class LocationService
extends Service
implements Tala_Constants, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.GooglePlayServicesClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener

class that manages the location client, places location requests, and keeps track of the places that we are currently in proximity to. this is one of the most important classes. it is a service, so it doesn't directly change the GUI

Author:
Devin Frenze, Nora Hayes
